game.name: Souls Arena 100 Trials
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A mini Souls-like arena game. Survive waves of enemies, defeat mini-bosses, loot weapons and potions, and unlock 100 achievements in an intense and compact experience.
